title: Managing Stress and Wellness During the Pandemic
itunes:title: Managing Stress and Wellness During the Pandemic
description:
We get Businessweek Economics with Adam Ozimek, Chief Economist at Upwork. He discusses jobless claims and the Future Workforce Report. Dr. Laura Murray, Senior Scientist at Johns Hopkins University Bloomberg School of Public Health, shares her insight on managing stress and wellness during the pandemic. John Rogers, CEO at Ariel Investments, walks through why he thinks corporate America is missing its moment to act on racial inequity. Bloomberg Businessweek Writer James Tarmy and Columbia MFA Student Kevin Claiborne talk about how Kevin's photographs of Black Lives Matter demonstrations became an emotional record. And we Drive to the Close with Leo Kelly, CEO at Verdence Capital Advisors.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
